section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Pannonia is a producer of highly sustainable European bioethanol for use in the road transport sector.  Pannonia contributes to climate change mitigation and transport decarbonisation by making available ethanol fuel with greenhouse gas savings of over 60% compared to fossil fuel.  Pannonia was created by private investors as a direct response to Europe's 2009 Renewable Energy Directive.  Pannonia's goals in the context of this Transparency Register is to advocate and communicate the value the company provides in terms of climate change mitigation, innovation, investment, jobs and growth.
